msg: Updated the Maven build to remove old redundant details and to add a Clover coverage report by default.

author: jstrachan
msg: A simple ThreadPool component that can be useful for some simple lightweight asynchronous processing within a single process.
This can be useful in Servlet engines or Swing applications when some small things require asynchonrous processing.
